docs.snippet: Alice Mizrachi, 36, an artist and teacher, is helping her students find a passion for art while also making sure that the Harlem art culture “lives in a rich and authentic way.”...
docs.abstract: Alice Mizrachi, 36, an artist and teacher, is helping her students find a passion for art while also making sure that the Harlem art culture “lives in a rich and authentic way.”

headline.main: An Art Teacher Preserves the History of Harlem, While Creating Her Own Legacy

docs.snippet: Despite the bizarre antics of Mayor Rob Ford, most notably his use of crack, he will likely remain at the helm of Canada’s largest city until his term ends next year....
docs.lead_paragraph: Despite the bizarre antics of Mayor Rob Ford, most notably his use of crack, he will likely remain at the helm of Canada’s largest city until his term ends next year.
docs.abstract: Toronto Mayor Rob Ford will likely remain at helm of Canada’s largest and most affluent city at least until his term ends in 2014, despite his bizarre antics and use of crack cocaine; Ford's behavior, which has mortified many of his constituents, has also enhanced his appeal with many of his core voters--working-class residents of suburbs; City Council has voted to cut mayor's budget by 60 percent, and have eliminated most of his authority.

headline.main: His Honor? Toronto’s Mayor Rampages On, to City’s Shame
headline.print_headline: His Honor? Toronto’s Mayor Rampages On, to City’s Shame

byline.original: By JENNIFER STEINHAUER and IAN AUSTEN
